entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
